title: The Legend of Zelda: Oracle of Seasons and Oracle of Ages
summary: The Legend of Zelda: Oracle of Seasons[lower-alpha 1] and The Legend of Zelda: Oracle of Ages[lower-alpha 2] are two action-adventure games in the Legend of Zelda series, developed by Flagship (a subsidiary of Capcom). They were released in 2001 for Nintendo's Game Boy Color handheld console and re-released on the Virtual Console for the Nintendo 3DS in 2013. The games make up the seventh and eighth installment in the Zelda series.
